review_data.title: Very good Sorbet
review_data.content: I visited Himu & Holl after reading about it on Instagram. I really liked their sorbet, as it was tasting fresh and not sweet at all. I tested the raspberry sorbet and the basil sorbet. Both were very tasty and I would go for those...More

review_data.title: Zufrieden

review_data.title: Nice gelato, sorbet and friendly staff
review_data.content: Newly opened for a couple of months, Humi & Holl, is located at Limmatplatz. There are a few sidewalk tables and inside a split-level seating area. Martin was very friendly during my visit. This little dessert shop offers a range of gelato, sorbet, drinks and...More
